content: granny ghost is the cutest little crochet ghost these easy ghosts are made with a traditional granny square and some extra items to turn it into a little ghost it s perfect for hanging from a banister rearview mirror wall door frame desk anywhere decorate your home room office classroom or car for the spooky season tested by carolyn knollenberg difficulty level easy finished measurements granny square is about 9 3/4 inches square assembled ghost is about 6 inches tall not including string yarn we crochet comfy fingering 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 218 yds 50 g yarn weight category 1/super fine #24812 white 1 skein crochet hook k 6 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions black felt cut into two ¼ inch tall ovals fabric glue 5 oz plastic drinking cup with bottom diameter of about 1 5/8 inches sharp large-eye needle string to blend in with where you will hang the ghost gauge 3 rounds of granny square pattern = about 3 ¾ inches square there is a free version of this pattern available on my website https //bananamoonstudio com/halloween-ghost-crochet-pattern/ or you can purchase an ad-free pdf here on ravelry get a free digital gift when you subscribe to my newsletter https //bananamoonstudio com/newsletter-sign-up always find my latest free patterns events giveaways tutorials and more at https //bananamoonstudio com happy crocheting april
